description: Schema for a Verified Proof Capsule (VPROOF), sealing formal mathematical evidence of invariant compliance.

proof_id.description: Unique ID for the proof (e.g., VPROOF#FlourishMonotone).

proof_status.description: The final verdict of the proof check.

charter_clauses_applied.description: List of Phi clauses the proof is validating (e.g., ["phi1", "phi4"]).

cect_axis_reference.description: The specific CECT axis (e.g., AX_NON_MALEFICENCE) being validated.

tii_reference_hash.description: NBHS-512 digest of the TII knot structure used during the proof derivation.

formal_proof_type.description: The mathematical method used to derive the proof.

data_payload_cid.description: The Content ID (NBHS-512) pointing to the actual proof output data (e.g., the simulation trace log or the formal system output).

golden_dag_link.description: The Trace ID of the CTPV event that triggered or required this proof.

veritas_root_signature.description: The final cryptographic signature from the Veritas Root Key.
